website_summaries.verdict: All of your child's Littlest Pet Shop toys can have a home in this playset that's also easy to transport.
pros: Has room for up to 30 pets of different sizes and includes 2 accessories and 2 pets (one Classic, one Teensie)
Features cat towers, doggy doors, a swinging perch, slide, fishbowl, and more
Has a handle to make it easy to carry
cons: Set is smaller in person than some pictures make it seem

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good and cute and doesn’t take up that much space in my child’s room but she did think it would be bigger by the picture. It was also hard for her to put it all together and had to ask me to help. There was a random bird swing that we didn’t know where to put it. The instructions were very unclear as well. Other then that she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: jenny windrim

customer_reviews.title: Cozy home
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her LPS and this is a perfect home for them. There are so many little spaces so a lot of pets can fit on this at once, but it does only come with two. The slide going into the fishbowl is a huge attraction for a 5 year old! This set is much better made then the sets we have purchased the last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Al D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good thought, try again
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the LPS tree house playsets and LOVES it. We were expecting the PetUltimate Apartments to be similar in size and construction. (yes, I should have paid more attention to the measurements.) This is a teeny tiny set. Maybe 25% as big as the tree house. Once you put a pet in the room...the room is full. It's not like you can move the pet around to pretend it's doing anything. And the whole things is smaller, flimsier, just not as solid and sturdy as the tree house. My daughter does like playing with it - which is why it got the 3 stars it did. I was unimpressed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DE Mom

customer_reviews.title: Plain brown box.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said it was in a plain brown box so I wasn't surprised. But it was in a very SMALL brown box, not all puffed up to make it look like you were getting a lot for your money, like they are packaged in a retail store. It was a whole bunch of little pieces with no instructions included as to how or where to attach them to the plastic building. I was kind of embarrassed when the kid unwrapped it & even more when she couldn't figure out how to set it up without the help of her dad - who had to guess what went where. In the end, I guess she was happy with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Animal “Hotel”
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving this! She has a ton of little animals from various sets, and now they each have their own room. Set comes with two animals, so ignore the rest. It didn’t come with any directions, but it was easy to put together once we looked at other people’s pictures. She is loving it!!
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy and so does my daughter. Set is pretty durable as well. You will have to buy additional pets to fill it, as it only comes with 2. The set is fairly small and appears larger online.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Powers

customer_reviews.title: Totes Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. It did not come in a brown box. It was packaged as it would be at the store. My daughter is just getting into Littlest Pet Shop toys and just loves this home to store them in! I also love that I don't have to pick them up and keep them organized for her!
customer_reviews.author: jessica makosky

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until she had it for a few months before I made my review. A couple of the doors broke off in the first month she had it but other than that it has she has enjoyed it a great deal and plays with it almost daily. She really likes that it has a little pet bed for every type of little critters including fish and birds. It has brought her countless hours of joy and imaginative play. I would definitely recommend for kids. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Cute Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Was able to snag this for a good deal on cyber Monday as a Christmas present and I have to say I may like it more then my daughter 😂 It is pretty simple but also very cute, it has a ton of room for all of your LPS pets of all different sizes and is skinny enough to not take up much room at all. My only complaint (if I had to find one) is that the fish bowl on top is a bit too big for the fish that comes with it, just seems like it could have been smaller and maybe added more rooms instead. Other then that I absolutely adore it!
customer_reviews.author: ᴋᴀɪᴛʀᴏsᴇ

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was the packaging. It didn’t look like the packaging you would see in stores. It was a plain brown box with the Hasbro logo on it straight from the manufacturer. The toys inside looked like they were just thrown in there. There were no directions on how to put them together. The toys were easy to assemble, so not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Persephonie

customer_reviews.title: Holds over 30 pets living peacefully!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for this reasonable little pet shop apartment. It holds over 30 pets and the winter chalet just like it is a fine pairing. LPS items are rather expensive except this can also store the pets too.
customer_reviews.author: kgoss

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: we have a lot of older/ retired lps play sets and the quality doesnt compare. this one is thin and cheaply made. the older ones are thick plastic with a lot more detail. solid play sets. this is thin plastic and kind of boring. got a great deal on this for cyber monday, otherwise not worth retail IMO.
customer_reviews.author: jesse ross

customer_reviews.title: Limited animals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter as she's just getting into Littlest pet shop and it was on sale. I feel for the regular price and not the sale price they should add more to it. Everything is open holes so maybe more animals would make it better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Doronzo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. The frustration free packaging was great, just a plain cardboard box but it has the actual Hasbro logo and contents etc. on it. Toy was mostly put together already with some small pieces to attach. Our three year old has literally played with this all day long since she opened it at about 12 this morning. It's very light so she can easily carry it around but made well enough to be a good toy. Easy for small hands to use.
customer_reviews.author: ff1339

customer_reviews.title: Know what you’ll get with “easy packaging”
customer_reviews.text: We did opt for the easy packaging, but it only came in a cardboard box with no picture. But it was wrapped for Christmas so it ended up being ok. Only other thing was no instructions, which really didn’t need because it was pretty much assembled, except for this little piece we couldn’t figure out where it went. After Googling it, we found out wheee it went. But overall, our baby daughter was extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustration free packaging FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Cute but can’t really gift it in this trashy box! I didn’t know frustration free packaging meant it doesn’t come in any packaging, just the trash amazon box. This is not going to gift nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what lps pets to buy to fit it and one part doesn’t fit where it should
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what pets to get that will fit in it like on the bird swing? One part doesn’t fit so it just leaves an open hole in the top of one of the houses. Took pictures to show. Daughter loves it though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Making dreams come true!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! A little girl’s dream come true! “Gramma, I’ve wanted this all my life!” If I can make her this happy for Christmas, my purpose has definitely been accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia, Reviews by Room With Books

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good price until I got it and realized what was meant by stress free packaging. I still like it! But my kiddo will be a little confused opening Xmas am
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Okay. The doors fall off.
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything a kid wants it to be. As a parent, I feel like it’s a bit flimsy and I find the doors to this thing everywhere. She’s happy with it, but it wouldn’t be my first choice for a play set.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves Littliedt Pet Shop Apartment
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves Littliest Pet Shop Apartment!! She plays for hours with the little pets making up many different scenarios with them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rose

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very disappointed in the size of this based on other play sets she has seen. For 80 dollars I expected larger. My bad for not researching closer. This would be an excellent 50 dollar set. Quality is good but definitely disappointed the birthday girl.
customer_reviews.author: pferde01

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Granddaughter for all her LPS (regular and mini and teeny) as she already has a house, and now an apartment for her hug collection of LPS of all sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Steppin' Time

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new littlest pet shop house! I didn't think it was a big deal at all having it come in a brown box and no directions. The house comes all together you just have to find the spots for a few add pieces. When I got stuck I looked back at pictures and easily found and attached the add pieces. Definitely wouldn't think twice about purchasing for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DiGiantommaso

customer_reviews.title: My five-year-old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our daughter for her 5th birthday and she squealed with delight. She already had a lot of the littlest pet shop kitty cats so she had a blast playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: Zanzibar

customer_reviews.title: So many fun cubby holes / places

customer_reviews.title: I found it odd it did not come in a box with a picture on it

customer_reviews.title: Great for LPS lovers

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money for such a small play set

customer_reviews.title: Not original packaging
customer_reviews.text: Received package today. Very quick service, however, the littlest pet shop petUltimate apartments was in a brown shipping box, not the original little pet shop package. It appears that everything is there, but disappointed that it was not in original package because it is a gift. Would not have purchased, it looks like it was returned very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Good But Small
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to have it delivered, assembled and ready to use. However, it was much smaller than I had anticipated (which is my own fault for not looking at the measurements). Either way, my daughter was happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a Meh reaction or why did you buy me this!

product_meta.title: Littlest Pet Shop Pet Partment Play Set (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingThere really is no place like home – especially when that home is a flat in the fabulous PetUltimate Apartments complex! There sure is plenty for pets to do here. Kids can imagine them swimming in the rooftop fishbowl, playing on the swing or zooming down the slide! Beds and nooks abound, giving pets plenty of places to rest after an action packed day. Cat towers on the roof allow pets to keep an eye on all the action, while a swinging perch is just the right spot to sit for a bit. Top and bottom level doghouse doors are convenient for a canine resident (sold separately), and it looks like management provides a water bowl and food dish for the pets and their friends! The playset comes complete with 2 pet tenants (a kitty and her goldfish bestie), and fits up to 30 pets of various sizes (each sold separately). Best of all, the playset closes up and can be taken just about anywhere for on the go fun! Littlest Pet Shop and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: This version comes in simple brown packaging
Spacious playset with room for 30 pets of varying sizes (each sold separately)
Handle for on the go fun
Includes playset, 1 Classic and 1 Teensie scale pet, 2 accessories, and 1 habitat/base

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,035 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
